name: grepai (yoanbernabeu)
description: [项目级] Semantic Search & Call Graphs for AI Agents (100% Local)。来源: https://github.com/yoanbernabeu/grepai

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Semantic Search & Call Graphs for AI Agents (100% Local)

来源: https://github.com/yoanbernabeu/grepai
语言: Go
Stars: 1269

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: brew install yoanbernabeu/tap/grepai

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CHANGELOG.md
CLAUDE.md
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
Makefile
README.md
SECURITY.md
cli
cli/agent_setup.go
cli/agent_setup_test.go
cli/init.go
cli/mcp_serve.go
cli/mcp_serve_test.go
cli/root.go
cli/search.go
cli/search_test.go
cli/status.go
cli/trace.go
cli/trace_test.go

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Search by intent** — Ask "authentication logic" and find `handleUserSession`
- **Trace call graphs** — Know who calls a function before you change it
- **100% local** — Your code never leaves your machine
- **Always up-to-date** — File watcher keeps the index fresh automatically
- **AI agent ready** — Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf out of the box
- **MCP server** — Your AI agent can call grepai directly as a tool
